polygon.style: fill: inherit; stroke: inherit; stroke-width: 0.5; filter: drop-shadow(0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2));
fill: inherit; stroke: inherit; stroke-width: 0.5; filter: drop-shadow(0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.25));

path.style: fill: inherit; stroke: inherit; stroke-width: 0.3; filter: drop-shadow(0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15));

polygon.style: fill: #ffffff; stroke: inherit; stroke-width: 1.5; filter: drop-shadow(0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2));

circle.style: fill: #ffffff; stroke: inherit; stroke-width: 1.5; filter: drop-shadow(0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2));

div.style: position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; pointer-events: none; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif; z-index: 9999;
div.div: 💡 Drag to pan • Scroll to zoom • Click map to navigate • Click tables/edges to highlight • ESC/R to reset
